text: Destiny (: ein deutsches volkslied in 6 versen (Weary Death: A German Folk Story in Six Verses); originally released in the United States as Behind the Wall) is a 1921 German romantic fantasy movie directed by Fritz Lang and starring Lil Dagover, Walter Janssen, Bernhard Goetzke, Hans Sternberg, Max Adelbert, Wilhelm Diegelman, Karl Platen, Max Pfeiffer, Grete Berger. ==Other websites== * * Category:1921 romance movies Category:1920s fantasy movies Category:German fantasy movies Category:German romance movies Category:German silent movies Category:Movies directed by Fritz Lang
title: Destiny (1921 movie)
